subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: At the United States Open this week in Pinehurst, N.C., footprints in sandy areas not considered bunkers may end up posing unofficial hazards for players.
snippet: At the United States Open this week in Pinehurst, N.C., footprints in sandy areas not considered bunkers may end up posing unofficial hazards for players.
